programme.title: Slightly Single in LA
programme.desc: Dale Squire (Lacey Chabert: Mean Girls) is a hip, quirky, independent single gal living in the glossy city of Los Angeles. After several failed attempts in quasi-relationships, Dale concludes that finding a meaningful relationship in L.A. is impossible. When Zach, a successful heartthrob rock star and old friend of Dale's finds his way back into her life, Dale slowly starts believing in love again…

programme.title: Baby On Board
programme.desc: Angela Marks, an ambitious, image-conscious businesswoman working for over-demanding boss Mary. When Angela becomes unexpectedly pregnant at the peak of her career, her life with her divorce attorney husband, Curtis, is turned upside-down. An inconvenient pregnancy leads to a nine-month roller coaster ride as Angela and Curtis try to cope and the interference of best friends Danny and Sylvia escalate the situation into a full-on battle of the sexes...

programme.title: Frat Pack
programme.desc: A shy British graduate gets dragged on a wild road trip across America to a fraternity party by his soon-to-be stepbrothers, as his mother marries into a larger-than-life, American family. This raucous and wild comedy from Michael Philip (Drop Dead Sexy, Van Wilder 2, Timber Falls) stars Danny Trejo (Machete), Melissa Bolona (Acts of Violence, The Hurricane Heist) and Hana Mae Lee (Pitch Perfect).

programme.title: Masters of Love
programme.desc: Masters of Love' is a funny and moving look at the complications of modern love, friendship and dating, starring Edinburgh Festival Best Newcomer Ciarán Dowd ('Drunk History'). A group of friends are at different stages in their relationships and none of them are convinced about what they're doing: Emmy and Samantha are due to get married, Josh and Jenifer are breaking up and Niall is sleeping around but can any of them hold down a relationship?

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.title: High Fashion to High Street
programme.desc: The designers are asked to create their own take on the future of streetwear. They are given just one day to complete the challenge and impress fashion legend, Dapper Dan. (S17, Ep5)

programme.title: Power Play
programme.desc: The designers take on the virtual world of fashion in this video game challenge. They must each create their own female video game protagonists with a functional and stylish look fabulous enough to earn them an extra life in the competition. (S17, Ep6)

programme.title: Elegance is the New Black
programme.desc: The designers are surprised with an invitation to a Brandon Maxwell photoshoot and challenged to impress him with THEIR take on elegance! If the pressure wasn't high enough, the designers are faced with a flash sale challenge. (S17, Ep7)

programme.title: Blame it on Rio
programme.desc: Stylist Marni Senofonte is back, this time to challenge the designers to work in her wheelhouse: celebrity styling. The designers divide into teams to create a mini-collection for Deadpool's Morena Baccarin, who is heading to Rio on vacation. (S17, Ep8)

programme.title: The Stich is Back
programme.desc: The designers are surprised to find their workspace decked-out in everything Elton John. They learn they'll be creating an over-the-top look inspired by the movie, Rocketman. (S17, Ep9)

programme.title: What Do You Care About?
programme.desc: The remaining seven designers dig deep in this challenge and use their skills to bring attention to a social cause they care deeply about. Judge Elaine Welteroth mentors each designer on channeling their creative voice for change. (S17, Ep10)

programme.title: New York City of Dreams
programme.desc: The designers head to the store and atelier of their mentor, Christian Siriano, for a look at what could be their future as the winner of Project Runway. There they are asked to create dream dresses for the civic workers of NYC. (S17, Ep11)

programme.title: The Art of Fashion
programme.desc: It's the last challenge to determine which four designers will move on to the finale. Each designer is tasked with creating their biggest and best look as well as designing an experiential art installation in which to showcase it. (S17, Ep12)

programme.title: One Elle of a Day
programme.desc: The remaining designers arrive at a new workspace to unpack their collections and learn their final challenge. Nina Garcia meets them at the Elle Magazine offices and the designers are sent spiraling when tasked with a surprise 11th look. (S17, Ep13)

programme.title: The Best Of Laurel And Hardy
programme.desc: The best moments from the most comical duo in film history: Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy! This compilation features some of the funniest scenes from comedies that made this pair into household names.

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Champions: France
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, seven-time UEFA champion and FIFA Women's Player of the Year in 2018, awaits the arrival of Annie Fortems, a pioneer of French women's football, and Sonia Ouchene, a promising young player from Stade de Reims, at the Olympique Lyonnais stadium. Wendie recalls the start of her career, her victories and difficult moments including racist attacks. Annie reveals how her generation brought women's football into the French mainstream, despite receiving death threats, while Sonia speaks freely about the gender pay gap between women's and men's football. The meeting of the three is resplendent with mutual admiration.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: World Heritage Cyprus

Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Off The Grid Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh

programme.title: 10 Days South Africa Durban

programme.title: Backpack Caesarea, Israel

programme.title: Unwind Banyan tree, Maldives

programme.title: City Breaks Budapest 2, Hungary

programme.title: Off The Grid Loango National Park, Gabon

Venturing onto the picturesque forested wraps and camping under the open sky will truly give you goosebumps.

programme.title: Landmarks Ha Long Bay, Vietnam

programme.title: Best From The Rest Maltese Experiences

We give you five reasons to visit the European paradise.

programme.title: The Cook’s Pantry with Matt Sinclair Season 1
programme.desc: From an early age, Matt knew he wanted to create something unique with his food. From the suburbs of Sydney, Matty spent over a decade working in hospitality. Here he evolved a curiosity of the industry, and the desire to work with food as a career. This saw him audition for MasterChef, where he quickly became a household favourite, triumphing as the 2016 runner up. Shortly after, Matt’s dream to own a successful food truck business came true. The quick growth and success saw their business grow into a fullyfledged restaurant in Noosa on the Sunshine Coast. The Cooks Pantry is a weekly cooking show that celebrates the creation of wholesome Australian food. Join Matt Sinclair and his fellow foodies Courtney Roulston and Michael Weldon. As successful MasterChef contestants, the team combine together to help you create simple, delicious food.

From the simplest of meals to more sophisticated recipes and techniques, Everyday Gourmet will inspire viewers to get more out of their kitchens.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Asian Food Trail
programme.desc: Throughout the series Luke is joined by close friends, local chefs and of course his family which play such a large part of his life. Luke Nguyen’s Food Trail tracks Luke’s life and career from where it all started in Sydney, moving to Saigon and then onto Hong Kong. From Sydney Australia where Luke grew up first got inspired to cook, all the way to Saigon coming full circle with the grand opening of Luke’s new restaurant, only weeks away. He takes us on a guided behind the scenes experience the nerves have been building with the opening of his dream fine dining restaurant in Saigon. Join Luke as he cooks a variety of exquisite Asian and visits some of his favourite restaurants and nightspots where we see a different side of each exciting and sophisticated city.

programme.title: Henry VII: The Winter King
programme.desc: Historian Thomas Penn reveals the secrets of the founder of Britain’s great Tudor Dynasty – and his amazing trajectory to power... Two weeks after landing on the shores of Wales in 1485 with a small band of supporters, Henry of Richmond defeats the notorious Richard III at the Battle of Bosworth – the last brutal moment of the Wars of the Roses. He is crowned Henry VII and marries Elizabeth of York to help build his new dynasty – and then begins a career of realpolitik. Rich with incident and drama, this is an unforgettable story of pageantry, treachery, dark politics, the thirst for glory – and the anxious unstable birth of Tudor England.

programme.title: Journey to the Pale Red Dot
programme.desc: On the hunt for other solar systems, scientists have discovered an Earth-sized planet orbiting the star nearest to our Sun, Proxima Centauri. It's an important test of whether we are alone in the universe. Stephen Hawking and others are calling for a mission to search for extraterrestrial life. NASA and private companies are studying what it will take to make our first interstellar space flight.

programme.title: The Bay Games
programme.desc: Over 600 everyday athletes came together and competed in the country’s first ever functional fitness festival. Jervis Bay, NSW is home to The Bay Games, a two-day event that pushes these weekend warriors to their limits and beyond. Our cameras were there.

programme.title: ICEolation
programme.desc: Antarctica is a place few get to visit, let alone connect with. This is the story of two paddlers with adventurous spirits, whom when presented with an unique opportunity to undertake a self-supported sea kayak expedition in Antarctica, took it. Took it as an opportunity to go beyond adrenalin-based desires and the pleasing of engorged ego’s and instead explore as much within themselves as explore the magical, ice-littered waterways of the Antarctic Peninsula. Throughout the narrative, the theme of the film – connection – is woven in, along with an insight into the preparations necessary for an expedition of this magnitude. Together with candid images of the complexities of daily life in this unique environment, this story aims to inspire other adventurous folk to do more than explore just the physical realm of whatever incredible wilderness they next find themselves in. For there really is so much more to explore. Finalist - VIMFF 2020. Winner - World Tour Paddling Film Festival 2020. Best NZ Made Film - New Zealand Mountain Film 2019. Finalist - Audience Awards 2019. Official Selection 2020: Nature Track Film Festival. Official Selections 2019: Adventure Outdoor Fest, Adventure Shorts Film Festival, Cradle Mountain Film Festival, Kendal Mountain Film Festival, Polar Film Festival, AMA.

programme.title: Numbers
programme.desc: Zero is a number that was inconceivable to humankind and peculiar in many regards compared to the other numbers. Today, the existence of zero is common knowledge and most people find it hard to understand why it could be different or special. Zero is a key number in the Arabic numeral system that is prevalent all over the world today.

programme.title: Atom: Clash of Titans
programme.desc: The first of three programmes in which nuclear physicist Professor Jim Al-Khalili tells the story of the greatest scientific discovery ever - that everything is made of atoms.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Materials
programme.desc: From the earliest tool from a piece of stone to implanted bionics, the history of human civilization is a history of materials. Today more than ever we need to use materials intelligently to meet the challenges of tomorrow. The film takes us on a journey to meet the pioneers of material science and reveal their extraordinary discoveries that are transforming the world around us.

programme.title: Stephen Fry's 100 Greatest Gadgets: Part 1
programme.desc: Mr Stephen Fry, the planet’s brainiest tech-head, exclusively presents his personal list of favourite gadgets. This is a nostalgic romp through the devices that have revolutionised our individual and collective lives, from the Abacus and the Umbrella, the Typewriter and the Trouser Press, Curling Tongs, and Swiss Army Knife, to the Walkman and the iPod. Clever stuff, gadgets. The show is an entertaining mix of cutting-edge technology, misty-eyed nostalgia and the fascinating insights for which Stephen Fry is renowned.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson find out just how agile the Porsche and Bentley are by conducting a moose avoidance test. Don Lope is well-liked and well-known because of his honorable nature, despite his socialistic views about business and religion. But Don Lope's one weakness is women, and he falls for the innocent girl in his charge, seduces her, makes her his lover, though all the while explaining to her that she is as free as he. But when she acts on this freedom, Don Lope must deal with the consequences of his world-view.

programme.title: Metropolis
programme.desc: Incorporating more than 25 minutes of newly discovered footage, this 2010 restoration of METROPOLIS is the definitive edition of Fritz Lang’s science fiction masterpiece. Backed by a new recording of Gottfried Huppertz’s 1927 score (presented here in 5.1 Stereo Surround), the film’s dazzling visual design and special effects are more striking than ever. And the integration of scenes and subplots long considered lost endows METROPOLIS with even greater tension and emotional resonance, as it dramatizes the conflict between wealthy über-capitalists and rebellious subterranean laborers—orchestrated by a diabolical scientist capable of destroying them both.

The experiment is successful, turning Rick into a super-human. But it also creates deadly side-effects which threaten the lives of Rick, his wife (Taylor Schilling: Orange is the New Black) Abigail, his family, and possibly humanity itself. This exhilarating sci-fi thriller from the producers of Insidious and Sense8, also stars Nathalie Emmanuel (Game of Thrones) , Tom Wilkinson (2 time Academy Award® Nominee) and Agyness Deyn (Clash of the Titans, Hard Sun).

programme.desc: An Elephant’s Journey' is a fun-filled and moving family adventure about a circus elephant and the importance of family and friendship. Starring Disney Channel favourite Jenna Ortega and Hollywood’s David Arquette and Tom Arnold, fans of 'Dumbo' will love this film. Flora is a circus elephant who can no longer perform her tricks. Left out and alone, the circus owner's 14-year old daughter, Dawn, sneaks Flora from the circus after she finds the perfect place for retirement: an elephant sanctuary 480 km away. All that stands between them and the safety of the elephant preserve is hundreds of kilometres of woods, one raging river, two elephant hunters and the fear of not making it. A.k.a. Saving Flora

programme.title: Love Finds You in Sugarcreek
programme.desc: A father and son fleeing a shocking and brutal tragedy settle in the predominantly Amish town of Sugarcreek, Ohio. They are taken in by three sisters who offer the father work as a handyman, but a local policewoman begins to become suspicious of his past.

programme.title: My Dad's A Soccer Mom
programme.desc: Marion "Mad Dog" Casey is one of the biggest, baddest and most outrageous names in professional football, but lately his mouth has been outpacing his performance on the field. When Marion's contract isn't renewed and no one else rushes to sign him, he's not happy. Meanwhile, his wife Holly, who has spent many years being a stay-at-home mom for their 10-year-old daughter Lacy, sees this as an opportunity for her to pursue her career ambitions in interior design. After chauffeuring Lacy to ballet and theatre class - activities she really doesn't like, Marion discovers that she has a knack for soccer. He signs her up and begins his new life as a Soccer Dad - the only 300-pound, overbearing, ex-football player in the group! As he navigates the trickiness of being a hands on parent with soccer mom Lori and the other moms, Marion discovers the joy of his new relationship with his daughter

programme.title: Identical Love
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Dr. Charlotte Hudson needs to escape life at home. She signs up to volunteer at a health clinic in a tropical country. But her plans of escaping are thrown off when she comes across her former fiancé’s twin brother, Seth (a dentist), who is also volunteering with the clinic. As they spend time together, Seth falls in love with Charlotte, but she struggles to let go of seeing her fiancé every time she looks at Seth. The island romance will help her break free from the past and love Seth for who he is.

programme.title: Letters To God
programme.desc: Tyler Doherty is an extraordinary eight-year-old boy. Surrounded by a loving family and community, and armed with the courage of his faith, he faces his daily battle against cancer with bravery and grace. To Tyler, God is a friend, a teacher and the ultimate pen pal-Tyler’s prayers take the form of letters, which he composes and mails on a daily basis. The letters find their way into the hands of Brady McDaniels, a beleaguered postman standing at a crossroads in his life. At first, he is confused and conflicted over what to do with the letters. But the decision he ultimately makes becomes a testament to the quiet power of one boy’s shining spirit and unshakable faith.

programme.title: Storm Rider

She has to leave her cushy home and loses her prize horse to stay with her gruff uncle, Sam. As Dani and her uncle struggle to bond, she's given an orphaned colt that is a different type of horse than she is used to training. Dani pours her affection into 'Stormy' and through him learns what's missing in her unsettled life.

programme.desc: Prisoners are encouraged to let their minds go, during a yoga class… Averell’s spirit leaves his body and travels through walls, just ike a ghost! Although Averell’s spirit is as stupid as usual, his ethereal mind actually can help his fellow Daltons escape… but when they’re in the desert, they have a problem: how can they get Averell inside his body - back there?

programme.title: Louie - Season 2 - Episodes 1-3
programme.desc: Louie, Draw Me a ButterFly Louie, Draw Me a Pig Louie, Draw Me a Tow Truck Have you ever dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you yearn to race cars or talk to friendly bears? No problem! Everything is possible with Louie! With his and Yoko´s help, you´ll learn how to draw while having fun!

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Full of shock turns, moments of horrific injury, polar bear action and tense emotional scenes, Arctic will keep your hands clenched to your chair until its brilliant, breathless conclusion. Mads Mikkelsen gives a tour de force performance as a pilot whose plane has crashed in a remote corner of the Arctic. Stranded in the wilderness he uses his ingenuity to survive. When about to receive his long-awaited rescue, an explosive accident means his opportunity is lost and the dire situation further complicated. The tragic turn of events, involving another crash survivor forces the pilot to make a perilous choice between the relative safety of his camp and a deadly trek into the unknown.

programme.title: 100 Streets
programme.desc: The interconnecting stories of three people, a separated wife and mother, a small time drug dealer and a cab driver, within one area of contemporary London. All three face major choices and change in their separate lives, as their paths sometimes cross.

programme.title: The Strange Ones
programme.desc: Mysterious events surround two travelers, presumably brothers, as they make their way across a remote American landscape. On the surface all seems normal, but what appears to be a simple vacation soon gives way to a dark and complex web of secrets.

programme.title: JT LeRoy
programme.desc: When her debut novel becomes a best-seller and JT becomes the darling of the literary world, she comes up with a unique solution to preserve her anonymity but give life to her nom-de-plume. Enter her boyfriend’s androgynous sister Savannah Knoop (Kristen Stewart: The Twilight Saga, Charlie’s Angels), who connects with Laura’s punk, feminist, outsider universe and agrees to be JT in the public eye. Together, they embark on a wild ride of double lives, infiltrating the Hollywood and literary elite, and discovering who they are while pretending to be someone else.

programme.title: Love Me Like You Do
programme.desc: Ryan Brenner is a traveling musician, and Jackie Laurel is a fallen country music star who is a recently single mother, battling to hold on to her young daughter. When the free-spirited pair meet by chance, they soon form an unlikely relationship that will teach them to trust and love again, and may change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Operative
programme.desc: "MUNICH meets HOMELAND in this taught and pacy psychological thriller following an undercover spy. The Operative follows the story of Rachel, a rogue spy from Israel's feared national intelligence force Mossad, vanishes without a trace while attending her father's funeral in London. The only clue to her whereabouts is a cryptic phone call she places to her former handler Thomas, who is then summoned from Germany to Israel by Mossad. With Rachel's life immersed in her assignments as part of a vast espionage effort against Iran's nuclear program, Thomas must retrace her steps to determine what threats she may now pose to their operation, while also working to protect her.

programme.title: Disturbing the Peace
programme.desc: A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting must pick up his gun again to battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that have invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist. From the producers of 'Bone Tomahawk' and 'The Hurt Locker'.

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: When law student Harper (Tye Sheridan - X-Men: Apocalypse) wakes with an almighty hangover the last thing he expects at his front door is threatening tough guy Johnny Ray (Emory Cohen - Brooklyn) and his girlfriend Cherry (Bel Powley - The Diary of a Teenage Girl), but he soon comes to realise that a drunken bar conversation the previous night is about to turn into a dark and dangerous reality. Harper obsesses that his step-dad Vincent (Stephen Moyer - True Blood) is responsible for the car crash that has left his mum in a coma, and Johnny Ray is here to drive them all to Vegas where he's agreed to kill Vincent for $20,000.

programme.title: Planet Hulk (Marvel)
programme.desc: He was a monster, impossible to control, too dangerous to ignore. So Earth’s mightiest heroes exiled him into outer space. But now THE Incredible Hulk crash-lands on the distant planet Sakaar, ruled by the tyrannical Red King. Sold into slavery, the Hulk becomes the planet’s mightiest gladiator—but his new masters get more than they bargained for when he forges a bond of brotherhood with his fellow fighters. Unlike Earth, the desperate people of Sakaar believe a monster is just what they need. But will the Hulk be the one to save their world...or destroy it?

programme.title: Witchville
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, Erik and Jason seek out his compatriot Malachy and force him to return to his homeland. When they arrive, they find that Malachy's father, the King, is dead and their lands are completely devastated. Both seek revenge against the Evil Red Queen.
